main event: A silvery white, undetermined-shaped object was observed hovering and moving back and forth in East Ely, Nev. before shooting up and away.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 1000 ft.
It was seen by civilians and observed for 15 minutes before disappearing from sight in less than a minute.
The witnesses were hesitant to report the sighting, possibly due to the difficult decision of what to do under the circumstances.
The report was acknowledged by the Air Material Command and the letter from the witness was appreciated.
The object was estimated to be traveling at around 100 mph.
